title: (x) simple serif "Sonoma" - Wilke {Evan (self)}
content:
This looks easy, but cannot remember the name. Maybe Adobe or Berthold?

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [sonoma.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20060604065332/http:/typophile.com/files/sonoma.jpg) | 10.75 KB |
author: evan

comments.content: OK, I thought I stumped everyone. I poured over several catalogs and I believe it is Wilke.

If you want agreement, I think you’ve nailed it. It looks slightly heavier than the Normal weight, but it not Bold, so I presume it’s the way the sample was scanned.

For those who want it here is a link to [Wilke](http://web.archive.org/web/20060604065332/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/wilke/), designed by Martin Wilke.

- Mike Yanega
